aboutDescription: My name is Donovan Jerez, I recently graduated with a degree in Computer Systems Engineering from the Autonomous University of Aguascalientes. During my time at university, I participated in cybersecurity hackathons, data analysis courses, competitive programming, and organized various activities for the university community.

experiences.description: Lead Support Organizer for university-wide congress, demonstrating strong organizational and leadership skills. Active Participant & Organizer in internal programming competitions, showcasing competitive programming abilities and event coordination. Competed in National and International CTF Hackathons, highlighting expertise in cybersecurity, problem-solving, and critical thinking. Completed coursework in Data Analysis and Bot Programming, indicating proficiency in data interpretation, automation, and relevant technical skills.
experiences.skills: Dart, Flutter, DBA, Clean Architecture,Legacy code, Trello, Google workspace, PHP with Laravel, CPanel, MySQL, NodeJs, MongoDB, firebase

experiences.description: I collaborated as an intern doing testing, solving visual issues, calculations, and integration problems. I also developed new implementations. In this area, I worked with only one Senior programmer.
experiences.skills: Dart, Flutter, Testing, SCRUM, KANBAN, Trello, Clean Architecture, MVC, PHP with Laravel, firebase

experiences.description: I participated in the development of a new website. The development required client requirement analysis, as well as analysis of existing content from the previous website. The development required only one person and a Senior programmer who was in charge of supervising the security and quality of the project.
experiences.skills: Vue.js, JavaScript, Google Docs, KANBAN, TRELLO, Slack
